title: Completely Renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent
description: Completely renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent. This corner property feels so spacious and bright with natural light abound through the 14 windows, a 18 feet wide lot, and 10 feet high ceilings. Enter the expansive open floor plan which includes a living, dining, and kitchen area. The finishes are fantastic with black metal railings, rich dark brown hardwood floors, recessing lighting, and modern trim and doors. In the kitchen you will find GE stainless steel appliances, two toned high gloss grey and white cabinets that further reflect the natural light, a quartz countertop with loads of space for prepping food and a coffee maker, etc.., a sculptural white backsplash tile, and an island with seating for three, one waterfall edge, a double sink and pendant lighting. The first floor also has a convenient half bath and coat closet as well. On the second floor, you will find the primary suite in the rear with a full bathroom, walk in closet, and it's own private deck to enjoy your coffee, enjoy a roof garden, or relax and read a book. The primary bath has a stall shower with a detachable sprayer, lovely large tile work, and double sinks. There are also two other bedrooms with good sized closets and another full bath with a tub. Walk up another flight to a pilot house and enter the large roof deck to entertain friends and family and enjoy vistas of city center. The finished basement can be used as a a game room, office, or workout space. It also has a separate storage area and the mechanical closet too. Enjoy this fantastic location near Wharton Square Park, wonderful coffee shops like Ultimo, or walk to the Sardine Bar, Philly Tacos, and Community for a bite to eat. Also, just a 20 minute walk to Rittenhouse or a quick hop on 476 for easy commuting too. Owner looking for a December 1st start date on the lease and open to a longer term lease (ie a 14 or 16 month lease.)

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.

title: Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome
description:
Available Now for rent in Queen Village. Experience city living in this charming & sun-filled Townhome located in Queen Village featuring 3 bedrooms & 1 1/2 bathrooms. Arrive home to an open floor plan ideal for entertaining family & friends. You will be delighted with the open floor plan for the living room and dining, recessed lighting & hardwood floors on the first & second floor. The beautiful eat-in kitchen is equipped with Refrigerator, Microwave Oven, Range, Hood & Dishwasher with plenty of cabinetry for storage & countertops for creating your culinary delights. Added bonus of first floor 1/2 bathroom. Access provided to the spacious rear yard from the kitchen. The patio is a wonderful space for grilling and relaxing. The first floor is graced with original hardwood flooring and the second floor of the home is naturally filled with sunlight. Second floor features 3 spacious bedrooms plus 1 full bathroom. The bathroom is beautifully updated & offers a tub/shower combination and vanity. Access to the basement provides plenty of storage. There is a laundry which includes washer and dryer. The home was recently renovated in the last 2 years and offers newer plumbing, electric, HVAC to include Central Air Conditioning. Prime location in desirable Queen Village neighborhood. Daily errands do not require a car as this is a walker’s paradise. With an amazing Walk Score of 98, Transit Score of 70 & Bike Score of 81. You will enjoy living in this home & will appreciate all of amenities that that neighborhood has to offer. Just moments to Meredith, venture to nearby Shots Tower coffee, Weccacoe playground, Mario Lanza park, restaurants along E Passyunk Ave & South St Super easy access to Delaware Ave, Old City, Ben Franklin Bridge & I-95. Easy access to nearby shopping; Target, Home Depot, TJ Maxx & Home Goods, Acme Market all along Delaware Ave. First month rent, last month rent and security deposit is required. Tenant is responsible for all utilities.

title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.

title: One-of-a-kind Dramatic Sun-filled Home With Towering Ceilings
description:
One-of-a-kind dramatic sun-filled home with towering ceilings, exposed brick and covered garage parking on a virtually hidden block in the historic Society Hill section of Philadelphia. This home features three levels of living with a massive living room, half bath, dining room and full kitchen conveniently located on the first floor. Following the exposed brick and sun drenched stairs up to the second level opens you to your first two bedrooms, laundry, and first full bathroom. Your master is revealed to you after a long private corridor greeting you with his and hers full bathroom with walk-in closet and tremendous shower room. The third floor features a romantic full floor fourth bedroom option with exposed beams and unprecedented privacy. Those of you who enjoy walkability, shops and a nightlife you can leave at the club will love the accessibility this home offers. Being footsteps away from some of the best restaurants, cafes and farmers markets this home allows you to enjoy the finer things the city has to offer. Highlights of the neighborhood include, The Twisted Tail, Bloomsday Café, Bistro Romano. In the mood for something else? Cherry street pier, Spruce Street Harbor park and Liberty point are only a 15 minute walk. Experience 114 Naudain in person and set up your tour today! Unit is part of an HOA which is included in monthly rent.

Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a hidden dishwasher, tons of useful counter space, a farmhouse sink, glass door leading to a private backyard. Upstairs you will find a large bedroom with a nice-sized closet with south-facing windows. You will also find a full bath with a tub on the second floor. There is also an open space that can be used as a bedroom, office, or flex space. This leads to a great deck overlooking the private backyard. The basement is fully finished and has great ceiling height. There is a full bathroom and laundry in the basement as well as an unfinished portion that is great for storage!
1013 Salter St

title: Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom
description:
Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom and Oversized Windows located in the heart of the historic Old City! 315 Flats is an Elevator Building with a welcoming lobby featuring Marble Floors and an Intercom/Camera system for Additional Security. Upon entering unit 301, you're greeted by 10-foot ceilings and South-Facing Oversized Windows filling the living space with natural light. The kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances, a built-in Microwave and Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Modern Cabinetry, and an Island overlooking the living area. Hardwood Floors are throughout the living space and bedroom. The living room/dining room combo offers views of The historic Quaker Meeting House and plenty of room for entertaining. The Bathroom includes a Double Sink, a Tub/Shower combo, and Tiled floors. The in-unit Washer & Dryer are conveniently located in a dedicated closet. The 10-foot Ceilings and Oversized Windows continue in the spacious bedroom, which includes a Walk-In Closet and a modern shelving unit for additional storage. 315 Flats is situated in the heart of the neighborhood and steps from excellent restaurants, shops, Spruce Harbor Park, Independence Hall, Philadelphia's most historic sites, and all that Old City offers. Easy access to I-95, the Vine Street Expressway, and Ben Franklin Bridge. Schedule a private tour today! Garage parking options are located right around the corner.
315 Arch St #301
